CAREER

Shape Your Future with Us

At PT Triatra Sinergia Pratama, our greatest asset is our people, driving the core of our business activities.

We actively seek and employ competent, high-quality individuals who collaborate to ensure the sustainability and success of our business.

In response to the growing challenges of the competitive business landscape, Triatra is dedicated to developing the character and competence of our workforce. We aim to cultivate individuals who embody the values of LA PATRIA, i.e., "Persistence, Agile, Team Player, Respect, Innovation, and Accountability." Triatra is committed to providing career opportunities, a collaborative culture, appreciation, and competitive compensation and benefits for all our employees.

Beware of Recruitment Fraud in the Name of PT Triatra Sinergia Pratama

The recruitment process at PT Triatra Sinergia Pratama is completely FREE of charge. PT Triatra Sinergia Pratama NEVER collaborates with any travel agencies or external agencies in the recruitment process.

If Young Talents come across any fraudulent job offers, please report them to human.capital@triatra.co.id.
